H0.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Stenographer

H1.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Typist

H2.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Secretary

H3.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Shorthand

A4.text: The process of writing in shorthand is called stenography, from the Greek stenos (narrow) and graphein (to write).

A5.text: Machine shorthand is also a common term for writing produced by a stenotype, a specialized keyboard.
